igella Sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, DISCLOSED FRAGRANCE**, [**COMPONENTS: Tanacetum Annuum (Blue Tansy) Flower Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Cistus Ladaniferus (Cistus) Oil, Helichrysum Angustifolium (Everlasting) Flower Oil, Rosa Centifolia (Rose) F

Centifolia (Rose) Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Flower Oil, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Oil], Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Farnesol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool

Directions: Use: Massage 1-2 pumps onto damp face, neck and d collet .

rns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
